episodes.title: The Church That Spawned a Cult
episodes.description:
Inside the Church of Jim Jones: A Tour Through Cult History

Step inside the eerie remains of the church that helped launch one of the most devastating cults in modern history. This is not just a building , it’s the birthplace of the Peoples Temple, the movement led by Jim Jones that ended in the tragic mass deaths of over 900 people in Jonestown, Guyana in 1978.

In this video, we explore the physical space where it all began, and the chilling atmosphere that lingers. No theatrics. No hype. Just facts, history, and the unsettling truth behind how one man built a following that ended in unthinkable loss.

Whether you’re a student of cult psychology, true crime, or modern American history, this walkthrough will give you insight into how power, faith, and manipulation collided inside these walls.

⚠️ Viewer discretion is advised.
🎥 Filmed with respect, and without dramatization.
🔔 Subscribe for more grounded explorations into dark history and the paranormal.

#JimJones #PeoplesTemple #CultHistory #Jonestown #ChurchTour #TrueCrime #HauntedHistory #Documentary
